general.question: What is included in a typical photography session?
general.answer: Every session includes a pre-consultation, professional photography, expert editing, and delivery of high-resolution images through a private online gallery. Specific inclusions vary by package.

booking.question: How far in advance should I book?
booking.answer: I recommend booking at least 4-6 weeks in advance, especially for weekend sessions and peak seasons (spring and fall). Wedding and event bookings should be made 3-6 months ahead.

travel.question: Do you travel for sessions?
travel.answer: Yes! I travel throughout California and beyond. Travel fees may apply for locations outside my standard service area. Contact me for specific travel arrangements.

weather.question: What happens if weather is bad for an outdoor session?
weather.answer: I monitor weather closely and will reschedule outdoor sessions if conditions are unsafe. Indoor backup locations are always available, and there are no fees for weather-related rescheduling.

creative.question: Can I request specific shots or poses?
creative.answer: Absolutely! I encourage clients to share inspiration photos and specific requests during our pre-session consultation. My goal is to capture exactly what you envision.

consultation.title: Initial Consultation
consultation.description: We discuss your vision, preferences, and session details

planning.title: Session Planning
planning.description: Location scouting, timing, and creative direction planning

session.title: Photography Session
session.description: Professional photography session capturing your unique moments

delivery.title: Gallery Delivery
delivery.description: High-resolution images delivered through private online gallery

servicesPage.title: Photography Services
servicesPage.subtitle: From intimate portraits to grand celebrations, we specialize in capturing life's most precious moments with artistry and authenticity.
servicesPage.servicesDescription: Each service is tailored to your unique needs, ensuring we capture the essence of your story with professional quality and artistic vision.
servicesPage.packagesDescription: Choose the package that best fits your needs. All packages include professional editing, high-resolution images, and a private online gallery.
servicesPage.customDescription: Need something custom? We'd love to work with you to create a package that fits your specific needs.
servicesPage.addOnDescription: Enhance your photography experience with these additional services. Perfect for making your session even more special and comprehensive.
servicesPage.serviceAreasDescription: We proudly serve clients throughout California and are available for destination sessions. Travel fees may apply for locations outside our standard service area.
servicesPage.readyDescription: Let's create something beautiful together. Contact us today to discuss your photography needs and find the perfect service for your special moments.

bayArea.name: Bay Area

destination.name: Destination
destination.description: Available for travel anywhere in the US

aboutPage.title: Meet the Artist
aboutPage.subtitle: Behind every photograph is a story, and I'm here to help you tell yours.
aboutPage.intro1: I love the little stories. The unstaged moments. What happens between the lines. It's not perfection that counts – it's personality.
aboutPage.intro2: I immerse myself, observe, accompany. I'm close when you need me – and reserved when the moment speaks for itself.
aboutPage.myWish: My wish: That you find yourself in your images – with all your facets.
aboutPage.numbersDescription: A decade of dedication to the art of photography has resulted in countless beautiful moments captured and preserved.
aboutPage.journeyDescription: Every photographer has a story. Here's how my passion for capturing authentic moments evolved into Visual Poetry Photography.
aboutPage.awardsDescription: I'm honored to have received recognition from peers and industry organizations for my commitment to excellence in photography.
aboutPage.philosophyQuote: Photography is not just about capturing what you see, but feeling what you experience. Every session is an opportunity to create art that tells your unique story and preserves the emotions of the moment forever.
aboutPage.readyDescription: Let's work together to capture your most precious moments. I'd love to hear your story and discuss how we can bring your vision to life.

2014.title: The Journey Begins
2014.description: Started photography as a hobby while working with horses, discovering my passion for capturing the bond between humans and animals.

2016.title: Professional Certification
2016.description: Completed advanced photography certification and began taking on professional clients, specializing in equestrian photography.

2018.title: Studio Launch
2018.description: Launched Visual Poetry Photography, expanding services to include portraits and business photography.

2020.title: Award Recognition
2020.description: Received first major photography award for excellence in equestrian photography from the California Photography Society.

2022.title: Digital Innovation
2022.description: Embraced cutting-edge digital techniques and expanded into lifestyle and event photography.

2024.title: Continued Excellence
2024.description: Celebrating a decade of capturing memories and continuing to push creative boundaries in photography.

authenticMoments.title: Authentic Moments
authenticMoments.description: Capturing genuine emotions and natural interactions that tell your real story.

personalConnection.title: Personal Connection
personalConnection.description: Building relationships with clients to create comfortable, meaningful sessions.

timelessQuality.title: Timeless Quality
timelessQuality.description: Creating photographs that will be treasured for generations to come.
